FX.name: OSC Echo
FX.description: The expression pedal controls the delay oscillation of this effect.

Parameters.name: OSC
Parameters.explanation: Adjusts the delay time and feedback.

Parameters.name: T-Min
Parameters.explanation: Adjusts the delay time when the pedal is at minimum position.

Parameters.name: T-Max
Parameters.explanation: Adjusts the delay time when the pedal is at maximum position.

Parameters.name: Mix
Parameters.explanation: Adjusts the amount of effected sound that is mixed with the original sound.
